fields.name: dictionary_id
fields.title: Dictionary ID
fields.description: The identifier used to refer to power plants in the Subak data cooperative

fields.name: plant_type
fields.title: Plant Type
fields.description: The type of wind farm, primarily onshore/offshore

fields.name: hub_height
fields.title: Hub-Height
fields.description: The distance from the turbine platform to the rotor of the installed turbines at a wind farm

name: wind-farms
title: GB Wind Farm Database
description: Dataset listing the plant types and hub-heights of wind farms
